Meanwhile, I'm over here barely scraping by on freelance gigs and wondering how I'll pay my rent next month. And don't even get me started on Mike, he's always posting these perfect Instagram photos of his beach vacation and his'side hustle' is apparently some kind of lucrative online business. I mean, what even is that? How does he do it? I've been trying to start my own business for years and I still can't seem to get off the ground. It's like, I'm just not good enough, you know? I'm starting to think I'm just delusional if I think I can ever make it as a designer. Maybe I should just stick to working at Starbucks like most of my friends...I mean, at least they're stable, right?"
